traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Galsariad has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Drain Potential
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. 22 (4d10 damage) necrotic damage, and Galsariad gains 5 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Gravity Wave {@recharge 5}
entries: Galsariad causes a rippling wave of magical gravity to fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 100 feet of himself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 35 (10d6 damage) force damage and is pulled up to 20 feet toward the sphere's center, and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled or knocked {@condition prone}.
